description: Come along for the ride as cartoonist/podcaster Len Peralta of Jawbone Radio tries to connect with 52 different influential geeks in one year.
title: Geek A Week

episodes.title: Geek A Week: Year Five Two: Drew Curtis
episodes.description:
The Official Geek A Week Interview with Drew Curtis, founder of Fark.com.  Pre-Order this new Season of Geek A Week and the reprint of Geek A Week Season 1.  It will be a playable CCG (colllectible card game)! And it's designed by Mike Selinker and Kid Beyond!

Also, limited quantities of previous Geek A Week cards at my online store.

RSS Feed
Download Now!


VISIT THE OFFICIAL SITE for GEEK A WEEK: http://geekaweek.net
